Question
========

Complete the statements on comparing regression models.

The residual squared sum (SSE) for a reduced model is ... than for a complete model.

The number of degrees of freedom (df) is for a reduced model ... than for a complete model. 
Answerlist
----------
* Smaller, smaller
* Smaller, larger
* Larger, smaller
* Larger, larger

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
